job_posting.ministry_description: Are you a visionary leader with a passion for advancing public health and improving population health outcomes? If you’re an experienced Public Health and Preventive Medicine professional with strong communication and collaboration skills, the Saskatchewan Ministry of Health invites you to join our team asDeputy Chief Medical Health Officer.

the_opportunity.intro: As one of two Deputy Chief Medical Health Officers, reporting to the Chief Medical Health Officer (CMHO), you will play a key leadership role in advancing public health priorities, protecting population health, and driving health equity across Saskatchewan.

benefits_list: Lead transformative public health initiatives and shape policies that directly impact the health and well-being of Saskatchewan residents;
Work in a dynamic and multidisciplinary environment with diverse stakeholders across sectors; and
Contribute to building healthier communities and driving positive change.

additional.diversity_statement: Preference will be given to qualified equity group members who self-declare in this online application, as identified in "diversity groups" below
